name: Attack of the Spooky Geometry
description:
Artfight 2021 Cyberpunk entry.

The universe is under attack by the "Spooky Geometry" and it's up to 4 special characters to defend it, choose between Aqua, Lilia, Lucis and Luna. Take to the skies and fight the geometrical menace.

Controls:

W,A,S,D or arrow keys to move.

Left click for primary attack.

Right click for special attack (specials have a cooldown).

If you die you will be taken back to the main menu.
